titleStmt.title: Copies of two papers written by the late King Charles II together with a copy of a paper written by the late Duchess of York.
titleStmt.author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
York, Anne Hyde, Duchess of, 1637-1671.
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

notesStmt.note: Both papers found by James II.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
